* Implements execution of the command that is sent

* If the command add, delete, or mark the tasks, execute use list's method
* If the command return an output, execute use ui's method
* If the command ask to exit, return true

* @param list TaskList object that to be used to update tasks
* @param ui Ui object that to be used to output the result
* @return return true if the command ask to exit and false otherwise
